comments.body: For other reviewers: We’ve discussed this and this should be fine. The bound was pretty tight and 150M isn’t that unreasonable for this test.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +29,33 @@# down is so big that this times out the 300s Bazel timeout whereas
# the fixed version runs in about 30s.
$DAMLC build --project-root $DIR/main +RTS -s -M150M -K1M -N1
